title: Pre-Paid Card
body: Does riot accept american express, because I bought a pre padi visa and it worked fine, but american express is not accepted.  Thoughts? EDIT: i tried the pre-paid and even checked on line to verify that the funds were there but it did not accept it.

replies.body: If you've made sure to complete setup of the card on [American Express' website](https://www.americanexpress.com/serve/cash-back-prepaid-card/), send me [a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing when you try to purchase RP. Be sure to block out any numbers that could be sensitive.

Hi, so actually its not a debit card, but one of the pre paid gift cards u get at like walgreens.  Ive never had to register a card before to make it work on the site, its just american express that is not accepted, but visa is

Interesting. our store shows that we accept American Express. Can you try adding the card to a PayPal account and trying checking out that way instead? I looked it up and paypal lists they [accept prepaid cards](https://www.paypal.com/webapps/mpp/template-management/prepaid-gift-cards).

Let me know what happens.
yo please help me out with the 33%-99% error.
